languages.text: "Послушай. Мы в проклятом городе друкари. Завтра, вероятно, мы мучительно и скоропостижно умрем. Тебе не наплевать на условности перед лицом смерти?"

traits.locale_text: "Послушай. Мы в проклятом городе друкари. Завтра, вероятно, мы мучительно и скоропостижно умрем. Тебе не наплевать на условности перед лицом смерти?"

languages.text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"
languages.original_text: "Послушай. Мы в проклятом городе друкари. Завтра, вероятно, мы мучительно и скоропостижно умрем. Тебе не наплевать на условности перед лицом смерти?"

traits.locale_text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"
"Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"
"Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"
"Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"

languages.text: “听着，我们身处被神明遗弃的黑暗之城，说不定明天就会死于非命。我们随时可能会没命，你他妈的真的还在乎什么体面不体面吗？”
languages.original_text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"

traits.locale_text: “听着，我们身处被神明遗弃的黑暗之城，说不定明天就会死于非命。我们随时可能会没命，你他妈的真的还在乎什么体面不体面吗？”

languages.text: «Escuche. Estamos en la ciudad maldita de los Drukhari. Es probable que mañana suframos un final truculento y repentino. ¿De verdad le importa un comino ser respetable ante la muerte inminente?».
languages.original_text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"

traits.locale_text: «Escuche. Estamos en la ciudad maldita de los Drukhari. Es probable que mañana suframos un final truculento y repentino. ¿De verdad le importa un comino ser respetable ante la muerte inminente?».

languages.text: 「聞いてくれ。我々はデュカーリの見捨てられた街にいる。明日は恐らく、背筋も凍るような突然の最期を迎えるだろう。死が目前に迫っているというのに、本当に威厳など気にしているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"

traits.locale_text: 「聞いてくれ。我々はデュカーリの見捨てられた街にいる。明日は恐らく、背筋も凍るような突然の最期を迎えるだろう。死が目前に迫っているというのに、本当に威厳など気にしているのか？」

languages.text: « Écoutez-moi bien. Nous nous trouvons dans la cité maudite des Drukharis. Nous allons sans doute mourir demain dans d'atroces souffrances, et malgré tout, vous faites la mijaurée pour des questions de respectabilité ? »
languages.original_text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez-moi bien. Nous nous trouvons dans la cité maudite des Drukharis. Nous allons sans doute mourir demain dans d'atroces souffrances, et malgré tout, vous faites la mijaurée pour des questions de respectabilité ? »

languages.text: "Hört mir zu. Wir sind in der verlassenen Stadt der Drukhari. Morgen wird uns höchstwahrscheinlich unser entsetzliches und plötzliches Schicksal einholen. Spielt das also angesichts unseres baldigen Todes wirklich eine Rolle?"
languages.original_text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"

traits.locale_text: "Hört mir zu. Wir sind in der verlassenen Stadt der Drukhari. Morgen wird uns höchstwahrscheinlich unser entsetzliches und plötzliches Schicksal einholen. Spielt das also angesichts unseres baldigen Todes wirklich eine Rolle?"

languages.text: "Beni dinle. Drukharilere ait ıssız bir şehirdeyiz. Yarın muhtemelen aniden korkunç bir ölümle yüzleşeceğiz. An meselesi olan sonumuzla yüz yüze gelmişken itibar gerçekten bu kadar umurunda mı?"
languages.original_text: "Listen. We are in the forsaken city of the Drukhari. Tomorrow we will probably meet our gruesome and sudden ends. Do you really give a damn about respectability in the face of imminent death?"
